bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names wan tan 頑痰 , stubborn phlegm; lao tan 老痰 , chronic phlegm. Etiological Agent. of sticky tan 痰① , phlegm, nodes that fail to leave the body easily. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry rui he 蕤核：主目腫眥爛，齆鼻，破心下結痰痞氣 , “It controls swollen eyes with festering canthi, and nasal congestion, and it breaks through bound phlegm and obstacle-illness qi below the heart”.
